input_text:
Job Title: Senior SharePoint Developer *SECRET CLEARANCE REQUIRED*

Location: Quantico, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Zachary Piper Solutions is seeking an on-site SharePoint Developer to join a long-term DoD program contract job opportunity supporting the USMC located in Quantico, VA.

MUST HAVE IAT LEVEL II CERTIFICATION AND ACTIVE SECRET CLEARANCE

Responsibilities for the SharePoint Developer:

Assist with projects post SharePoint Online migrationTrain users on SharePointWork as part of a team to meet deadlines and provide deliverables to government clientsModify existing application codes

Qualifications for the SharePoint Developer:

8+ years of experience with SharePointExperience with SharePoint Online, PowerBI, PowerAutomate, PowerApps, and languages such as JS, HTML, JQueryActive IAT II Certification (Security+ or equivalent)Active Secret Clearance with TS/SCI eligibility

Compensation for the SharePoint Developer include:

Salary Range: $100,000-120,000/year **depending on experience*Full Standard Benefits: PTO, Paid Holidays, Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K, etc.Lateral and horizontal growth opportunities
